info_bar.name: Ayeshmantha Madurnga
info_bar.infor_lamp_light: If I accept a job, I will somehow complete it.

tile_grid1.title: PCB Design
tile_grid1.text: I am capable of designing all the PCB designs you require. With a dedicated team under my supervision, we are committed to providing you with efficient service. We specialize in designing circuit boards for any application or problem.

tile_grid1.title: Inactive Design
tile_grid1.text: Inactive design can be a powerful marketing tool, allowing for the incorporation of entertainment or new technologies to create incredible creations in any desired manner.

tile_grid1.title: Embedded System Design
tile_grid1.text: We are ready to provide a technical solution to any problem you may have. Since we develop from the microprocessor level itself, we can create an efficient system suitable for the required work with a very low capital cost.

tile_grid1.title: PLC system design and program
tile_grid1.text: We specialize in PLC system design and programming services, covering the design of PLC systems of any model, panel board setup, and ladder programming. Furthermore, we offer customization options for sensor devices , HMI modules, SCART systems, and more, tailored to your specific requirements.

tile_grid1.title: Software Development
tile_grid1.text: We possess the expertise to develop software for any platform you require. Whether it's web applications or embedded system apps, we are committed to delivering high-efficiency, error-free solutions tailored to your needs.

tile_grid1.title: Planning and Drawing
tile_grid1.text: For SolidWorks, we excel in mechanical designs and can provide clear and accurate drawings for your needs. In Vectorworks, we specialize in event-related designs.
